title: Dell security advisory (AV25-779)
description: Between November 17 and 23, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell PowerProtect Cyber Recovery  version 19.21.0.1 and prior
Dell PowerProtect Cyber Recovery SLES  versions prior to 15.4.0-10
Dell PowerProtect Data Manager  versions prior to 19.22
Dell Storage Monitoring and Reporting  versions prior to 5.1.1.1 and versions prior to 6.0.0.0
Dell Storage Resource Manager  versions prior to 5.1.1.1 and versions prior to 6.0.0.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
